name: Asteroids (itch) (Boomboxpl)
description:
It's a simple asteroids game. The game not need a powerful computer. Your grandmother's computer can handle it (you only should have 1280x720 screen, but it is resizable window). It's written in C++ as my semester project. It uses SFML graphic library. 

How to play:

  • W/S - move forward/backward
  • A/D - rotate
  • Space - shoot
  • Escape - pause

You can change the settings in game.

This game don't have difficulty level change, so it's something similar to souls-like (not really).

That's all, maybe these two people that will download that is going to have fun.
